comment.author: 61614891@N06
comment._content: For years this Queen Air provided most of the service for Imperial Airlines on its only route, Imperial (near El Centro) to San Diego.  By this time Imperial had decided to upgrade to a Metro, which it had obtained jointly with Sun Aire.  The idea was that each airline would use the Metro part of the day.  As can be expected, that "sharing" did not work out.  Note by I. E> Quastler
